amendment.description: Amendment makes explicit that collaborative processes should be used to develop the management plan by calling for the equitable inclusion of all relevant estuary stakeholders; the use of neutral facilitators and processes to resolve conflicts; and the inclusion and use of up-to-date information, among other considerations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-463 to make explicit that collaborative processes should be used to develop the management plan. It would call for the equitable inclusion of all relevant estuary stakeholders; the use of neutral facilitators and processes to resolve conflicts; and the inclusion and use of up-to-date information, among other considerations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kratovil amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Kratovil.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kratovil amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
